description: Triangular array T read by rows: T(n,0)=T(n,n)=1 for n >= 0; for n >= 2 and 1<=k<=n-1, T(n,k)=T(n-1,k-1)+T(n-2,k-1)+T(n-1,k) if n is even and 1<=k<=n/2, else T(n,k)=T(n-1,k-1)+T(n-1,k).
formula: T(n, k) = number of paths from (0, 0) to (n-k, k) in the directed graph having vertices (i, j) and edges (i, j)-to-(i+1, j) and (i, j)-to-(i, j+1) for i, j >= 0 and edges (i, 2h+i)-to-(i+1, 2h+i+1) for i >= 0, h>=0.
maple: A026747 := proc(n,k)    if k=0 or k = n then        1;    elif type(n,'even') and k <= n/2 then        procname(n-1,k-1)+procname(n-2,k-1)+procname(n-1,k) ;    else        procname(n-1,k-1)+procname(n-1,k) ;    end if ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 30 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
